clinical_study.brief_title: Construction of a Database for the Life-cycle Sepsis-specific Disease Cohort
clinical_study.official_title: Construction of a Database for the Life-cycle Sepsis-specific Disease Cohort

lead_sponsor.agency: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

clinical_study.source: Xinhua Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: Establish a structured clinical database for sepsis screening, and establish a special data set standard for sepsis throughout the life cycle.

primary_outcome.measure: Sepsis organ function status and survival analysis.
primary_outcome.description: Safety indicators include: prognosis: mortality, intensive care unit (ICU) treatment time and hospital stay, incidence of nosocomial infections, treatment-related complications.
